About

Home Of Urban
Innovation

To elevate Cyberjaya into a Global Tech Hub , a conducive ecosystem is required for technological creativity. One of the Special Projects and an important focus area under the Global Tech Hub of Cyberjaya is the Smart City initiative.

Low Carbon City

Cyberjaya is envisioned to be a city which adopts intelligent technologies to promote more efficient public service and city living, higher quality of life within a safe city, and greater sustainability for the environment, in line with Cyberjaya’s Low Carbon City Framework.

After all, Cyberjaya was declared pioneer Green City of Malaysia under the 10th MP, and Cyberjaya is the 1st Low Carbon City in Malaysia.

Smart Technology

Synergising with the Living Lab initiative, Cyberjaya as a Smart City becomes a test bed for new technologies in the Global Tech Hub technology focus areas such as Wearable Technology, Internet of Things, Green Technology, Mobile Internet and others.

Smart City Framework

The Building Blocks of Smart Living

A liveable city is more than just an address – it’s a place where people can work and live life to the fullest. In order to bring the Smart City vision to life, infrastructure and application project collaborations have been created to enable its implementation.

Under the Cyberjaya Smart City Framework, the Smart City Solutions have been defined across 4 categories: Environment, Infrastructure, Economy and Social.

  • Environment
  • Infrastructure
  • Economy
  • Social
Improving efficiency and quality of infrastructure in Cyberjaya

Smart Environment focuses on two sub-categories: Resources/ Energy; and Mobility which are used to improve efficiency of energy and resources usage, and intelligent solutions to improve transportation efficiency.

Infrastructure

Phase 01
Introduction of smart city foundation (2015)
Phase 02
Promoting consumption of smart city solutions (2016)
Phase 03
Integrating solutions for control and monitoring (2017-2018)
Phase 04
Promoting widespread access and adoption (2019-2020)

When Our Powers Combine

How are we building the Smart City? Through Smart Collaboration.
Interoperability allows sharing of information which facilitates product innovation and co-production of urban services. This contributes to the liveability of Cyberjaya, promotes sustainable economic growth and helps develop new markets.

Let’s Join Forces!

We are keen to work closely with partners, residents and visitors of Cyberjaya to develop ideas and solutions aimed at improving the liveability of the city. We are looking for companies searching for a place to test their innovative technologies or willing to co-invest and collaborate, entities that will add visible value to Cyberjaya, and we welcome solutions that can be integrated into a common open platform.

What’s in it for everyone?

As our partners, you will benefit from creation of new and innovative products, co-production and optimization of urban services. Our Living Lab initiative enables you to use Cyberjaya as a test bed for your new technologies, that you can then launch into a broader ASEAN market. Leverage on our strong links to the Malaysian government and grab the opportunity to work with our partners like TM on brownfield and Greenfield projects.

Ultimately, our collaboration is working toward a greater cause for the public by solving existing problems and creating more business opportunities through sharing of data and collaboration.

So if you have a great idea and are ready to make history – let’s team up to transform Cyberjaya into a Global Tech Hub; the city of the future.

LET'S DEVELOP A SMART CITY LET'S COLABORATE
